category.name: iPods
category.description: Now that you can buy movies from the iTunes Store and sync them to your iPod, the whole world is your theater.

category.name: Laptops
category.description: The latest Intel processor, a bigger hard drive, plenty of memory, and even more new features all fit inside just one liberating inch. The new Mac laptops have the performance, power, and connectivity of a desktop computer. Without the desk part.
